name: Glide It Up
description:
This game is 2D and is an endless runner.

Glide up and dodge the flying objects inside of this epic sliding game! Don't touch red.

Updates: These will be put out if we need to change a bug or even make a big update!
Updates will come out every few months.

Connection: Lots of games take WiFi to play them but not this one we pushed to not have this game and many like it to non WiFi playing so that you the player would be able to play anywhere so yes play it on a bus!

Go play the game now!
